The rules

The competition will run for 10 working days. This means 10 challenges! The winner will be the person with the most completed challenges come the end of next week In the event of a tie, a tiebreaker will be used to decide the winner.

Listen Out!

Every weekday morning a new challenge will arrive via Slack

Complete it!

Use your day wisely. You’ve only got til 6pm to complete the challenge that’s been set!

Prove it!

Snap a picture of your proof and submit in Slack to win your point for the day
